amendment.description: An amendment numbered 112 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to reduce the salary of Tracy Stone-Manning, Director of the Bureau of Land Management, to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A062) Failed by recorded vote: 159 - 259 (Roll no. 589).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A062) Failed by recorded vote: 159 - 259 (Roll no. 589).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
